title: Indolence
description: Sins, Sisterhood, and Temptation...in a life governed by seven heavenly virtues, Diligence is the virtue I repeatedly fail to uphold...sinning comes much more easily to me. They say that the devil finds work for idle hands, and I’m about to discover I can truly be diligent to my faith… if the temptation is sweet and innocent enough, and she is almost perfectly angelic and corruptible.
author: Ally Vance
